1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Date using the Modified Julian Day (MJD).
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Type.Time.Date
6  ( -- * Data type
7    Date (..),
8    datePrecision,
9
10    -- * MJD to Date
11    mjdDate,
12    mjdDateClip,
13    mjdDateAb,
14
15    -- * Creating Date
16    ymdDate,
17    ywdDate,
18    ydDate,
19    ywDate,
20    ymDate,
21
22    -- * Clipped date
23    ymdDateClip,
24    ywdDateClip,
25    ydDateClip,
26    ywDateClip,
27    ymDateClip,
28
29    -- * Conversion
30    monthly, weekly, yearly,
31    byWeek, byMonth,
32    dateAltMjd, dateAddDay,
33    mix02,
34  ) where
35
36import qualified Data.Time.Calendar                    as Tim
37import qualified Data.Time.Calendar.WeekDate           as Tim
38import qualified Data.Time.Calendar.OrdinalDate        as Tim
39import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture              as O
40import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                  as B
41import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Type.Time.Parts       as T
42import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Type.Message          as Msg
43
44
45-- ----------------------  Type
46
47-- | Date with format.
48data Date
49    = Monthly T.Mjd    -- ^ Date in /YYYY-MM-DD/
50    | Weekly  T.Mjd    -- ^ Date in /YYYY-#WW-D/
51    | Yearly  T.Mjd    -- ^ Date in /YYYY-##D/
52    | ByWeek  T.Mjd    -- ^ Date in /YYYY-#WW/
53    | ByMonth T.Mjd    -- ^ Date in /YYYY-MM/
54
55instance Eq Date where
56    (==) = O.ordEq
57
58instance Ord Date where
59    a `compare` b = dateMjd a `compare` dateMjd b
60
61instance Show Date where
62    show d@(Monthly _) = "Date " ++ B.encode d
63    show d = "Date " ++ B.encode d ++ " (" ++ B.encode (monthly d) ++ ")"
64
65instance T.ToMjd Date where
66    toMjd = dateMjd
67
68-- | Get the name of date precision.
69datePrecision :: Date -> String
70datePrecision (Monthly  _)  = "day"
71datePrecision (Weekly   _)  = "day"
72datePrecision (Yearly   _)  = "day"
73datePrecision (ByWeek   _)  = "week"
74datePrecision (ByMonth  _)  = "month"
75
76-- | Get the internal Modified Julian Day.
77dateMjd :: Date -> T.Mjd
78dateMjd (Monthly mjd)  = mjd
79dateMjd (Weekly  mjd)  = mjd
80dateMjd (Yearly  mjd)  = mjd
81dateMjd (ByWeek  mjd)  = mjd
82dateMjd (ByMonth mjd)  = mjd
83
84
85-- ----------------------  Encode
86
87instance B.MixEncode Date where
88    mixEncode = dateToMix
89
90-- | Encode date.
91dateToMix :: Date -> B.MixText
92dateToMix date =
93    case date of
94      Monthly mjd  -> encodeMonthly $ Tim.toGregorian    mjd
95      Weekly  mjd  -> encodeWeekly  $ Tim.toWeekDate     mjd
96      Yearly  mjd  -> encodeYearly  $ Tim.toOrdinalDate  mjd
97      ByWeek  mjd  -> encodeByWeek  $ Tim.toWeekDate     mjd
98      ByMonth mjd  -> encodeByMonth $ Tim.toGregorian    mjd
99    where
100      encodeMonthly (y, m, d)  = B.mixDec y &-   mix02 m    &- mix02 d
101      encodeWeekly  (y, w, d)  = B.mixDec y &-#  B.mixDec w &- B.mixDec d
102      encodeYearly  (y, d)     = B.mixDec y &-## B.mixDec d
103      encodeByWeek  (y, w, _)  = B.mixDec y &-#  B.mixDec w
104      encodeByMonth (y, m, _)  = B.mixDec y &-   mix02 m
105
106      (&-)   = B.mixInfix "-"
107      (&-#)  = B.mixInfix "-#"
108      (&-##) = B.mixInfix "-##"
109
110-- | Create mix text with two-width zeros.
111--
112--   >>> mix02 5
113--   MixText "05"
114--
115mix02 :: Int -> B.MixText
116mix02 = B.mixDecZero 2
117
118
119-- ----------------------  MJD
120
121-- | Create date from the Modified Julian Day.
122--
123--   >>> mjdDate (55555 :: Int)
124--   Date 2010-12-25
125--
126mjdDate :: (T.ToMjd n) => n -> Date
127mjdDate = Monthly . T.toMjd
128
129-- | Create date from the Modified Julian Day.
130--
131--   >>> mjdDateClip $ T.ymd 2013 4 31
132--   Date 2013-04-30
133--
134mjdDateClip :: (T.ToMjdClip n) => n -> Date
135mjdDateClip = Monthly . T.toMjdClip
136
137-- | Create date from the Modified Julian Day.
138--
139--   >>> mjdDateAb $ T.ymd 2013 4 18
140--   Right Date 2013-04-18
141--
142mjdDateAb :: (T.ToMjdClip n) => n -> B.Ab Date
143mjdDateAb = fmap Monthly . T.toMjdAb
144
145
146-- ----------------------  Creation
147
148-- | Create date from year, month, and day.
149--
150--   >>> ymdDate 2013 4 18
151--   Right Date 2013-04-18
152--
153--   >>> ymdDate 2013 4 31
154--   Left ...
155--
156ymdDate :: T.Year -> T.Month -> T.Day -> B.Ab Date
157ymdDate y m d =
158    case Tim.fromGregorianValid y m d of
159      Just mjd -> Right $ Monthly mjd
160      Nothing  -> Msg.notDate y m d
161
162-- | Create date from year, week, and day.
163--   Day 1 for Monday, 2 for Tuesday, ..., and 7 for Sunday.
164--
165--   >>> ywdDate 2013 16 4
166--   Right Date 2013-#16-4 (2013-04-18)
167--
168ywdDate :: T.Year -> T.Week -> T.Day -> B.Ab Date
169ywdDate y w d =
170    case Tim.fromWeekDateValid y w d of
171      Just mjd -> Right $ Weekly mjd
172      Nothing  -> Msg.notDate y w d
173
174-- | Create date from year and day.
175--
176--   >>> ydDate 2013 108
177--   Right Date 2013-##108 (2013-04-18)
178--
179ydDate :: T.Year -> T.Day -> B.Ab Date
180ydDate y d =
181    case Tim.fromOrdinalDateValid y d of
182      Just mjd -> Right $ Yearly mjd
183      Nothing  -> Msg.notDate y 0 d
184
185-- | Create date from year and week.
186--
187--   >>> ywDate 2013 16
188--   Right Date 2013-#16 (2013-04-15)
189--
190ywDate :: T.Year -> T.Week -> B.Ab Date
191ywDate y w =
192    case Tim.fromWeekDateValid y w 1 of
193      Just mjd -> Right $ ByWeek mjd
194      Nothing  -> Msg.notDate y w 1
195
196-- | Create date from year and month.
197--
198--   >>> ymDate 2013 4
199--   Right Date 2013-04 (2013-04-01)
200--
201ymDate :: T.Year -> T.Month -> B.Ab Date
202ymDate y m =
203    case Tim.fromGregorianValid y m 1 of
204      Just mjd -> Right $ ByMonth mjd
205      Nothing  -> Msg.notDate y m 1
206
207
208-- ----------------------  Clipped date
209
210-- | Create date from year, month, and day.
211--
212--   >>> ymdDateClip 2013 4 18
213--   Date 2013-04-18
214--
215ymdDateClip :: T.Year -> T.Month -> T.Day -> Date
216ymdDateClip y m d = Monthly $ Tim.fromGregorian y m d
217
218-- | Create date from year, week, and day.
219--
220--   >>> ywdDateClip 2013 16 10
221--   Date 2013-04-21
222--
223ywdDateClip :: T.Year -> T.Week -> T.Day -> Date
224ywdDateClip y w d = Monthly $ Tim.fromWeekDate y w d
225
226-- | Create date from year and day.
227--
228--   >>> ydDateClip 2013 400
229--   Date 2013-##365 (2013-12-31)
230--
231ydDateClip :: T.Year -> T.Day -> Date
232ydDateClip y d = Yearly $ Tim.fromOrdinalDate y d
233
234-- | Create date from year and week.
235--
236--   >>> ywDateClip 2013 60
237--   Date 2013-#52 (2013-12-23)
238--
239ywDateClip :: T.Year -> T.Week -> Date
240ywDateClip y w = ByWeek $ Tim.fromWeekDate y w 1
241
242-- | Create date from year and month.
243--
244--   >>> ymDateClip 2013 13
245--   Date 2013-12 (2013-12-01)
246--
247ymDateClip :: T.Year -> T.Month -> Date
248ymDateClip y m = ByMonth $ Tim.fromGregorian y m 1
249
250
251-- ----------------------  Conversion
252
253-- | Convert date into monthly date.
254--
255--   >>> monthly $ mjdDate (55555 :: Int)
256--   Date 2010-12-25
257--
258monthly :: (T.ToMjd day) => day -> Date
259monthly = Monthly . T.toMjd
260
261-- | Convert date into weekly date.
262--
263--   >>> weekly $ mjdDate (55555 :: Int)
264--   Date 2010-#51-6 (2010-12-25)
265--
266weekly :: (T.ToMjd day) => day -> Date
267weekly  = Weekly . T.toMjd
268
269-- | Convert date into yearly date.
270--
271--   >>> yearly $ mjdDate (55555 :: Int)
272--   Date 2010-##359 (2010-12-25)
273--
274yearly :: (T.ToMjd day) => day -> Date
275yearly  = Yearly . T.toMjd
276
277-- | Convert date into by-week date.
278--
279--   >>> byWeek $ mjdDate (55555 :: Int)
280--   Date 2010-#51 (2010-12-20)
281--
282byWeek :: (T.ToMjd day) => day -> Date
283byWeek = week . Tim.toWeekDate . T.toMjd where
284    week (y, w, _) = ywDateClip y w
285
286-- | Convert date into by-month date.
287--
288--   >>> byMonth $ mjdDate (55555 :: Int)
289--   Date 2010-12 (2010-12-01)
290--
291byMonth :: (T.ToMjd day) => day -> Date
292byMonth = month . Tim.toGregorian . T.toMjd where
293    month (y, m, _) = ymDateClip y m
294
295-- | Alter the Modified Julian Day of date.
296dateAltMjd :: O.Map T.Mjd -> O.Map Date
297dateAltMjd f (Monthly mjd)  = Monthly $ f mjd
298dateAltMjd f (Weekly  mjd)  = Weekly  $ f mjd
299dateAltMjd f (Yearly  mjd)  = Yearly  $ f mjd
300dateAltMjd f (ByWeek  mjd)  = ByWeek  $ f mjd
301dateAltMjd f (ByMonth mjd)  = ByMonth $ f mjd
302
303-- | Add days.
304--
305--   >>> dateAddDay 7 $ mjdDate (55555 :: Int)
306--   Date 2011-01-01
307--
308dateAddDay :: (Integral n) => n -> O.Map Date
309dateAddDay = dateAltMjd . Tim.addDays . fromIntegral
